# TCControlContents.DpadDirection

**Enumeration**

Defines the direction of a direction pad visual.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DpadDirection
```

## Directions

- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection.down**: The down direction.
- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection.left**: The left direction.
- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection.right**: The right direction.
- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection.up**: The up direction.

## Creating a dpad direction

- **init(rawValue:)**

## System content

- **TCControlContents.ButtonShape**: Defines the visual shape of a button.
- **TCControlContents.DpadElementStyle**: Defines the visual style of the individual up/down/left/right elements of a direction pad.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
